name: Dusky Goat
description:
This goat appears no different from any other that lives in Teyvat â€” apart from its glowing markings and horns.
Its coat is a lighter shade than that of the Chestnut Goat, but it, too, has two layers of hair, with the outer layer being long and waterproof, while the inner, milk-white layer is soft and fluffy, making it an ideal material for winter wear and woolen blankets.
Long exposure to high-intensity kuuvahki environments has caused both its horns and the markings on its body to glow faintly.
